translations: 极乐的；使人幸福的；无忧无虑的；充满喜悦的

sentences.sentence: We spent three blissful weeks away from work.
sentences.translation: 我们无忧无虑地度了三个星期的假。

sentences.sentence: We spent a blissful week together.
sentences.translation: 我们在一起度过了极为幸福的一周。

sentences.sentence: Many country towns were still living in blissful ignorance of the post-war crime wave.
sentences.translation: 很多乡间小镇对战后的犯罪潮一无所知，依然生活在无忧无虑中。
